features: Built in 21 LED bulbs; HUONUL makeup mirror provides a good brightness for makeup; dim or brighten up the lights with a long pressing of touch screen switch
10X,3X,2X magnification modes; lighted makeup mirror has 3 panels magnifying and wide-angle viewing; see clearly your face and make a flawless makeup, suitable for desk makeup and handheld use
Dual power supply; makeup mirror with lights powered by USB charging cable or 4xAAA batteries; USB cable included, Charger and batteries not included
Adjustable degree rotation & touch control; adjust the mirror as per the suitable viewing angle you wish, easy and convenient touch switch, easily control the LED makeup mirror when doing makeup

Top gift for women; birthday gift, Valentine's Day gift, Mother’s Day gifts, Christmas gifts for teen girls, family, wife, or girlfriend, or another special day gift; Customer first; we can help if you have any issues with your purchase

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can this makeup mirror be charged? The mirror itself can't be charged, it needs to be plugged in or powered by batteries for use. Please don't use the battery and USB cable for power at the same time. Can the base of the makeup mirror be removed? There is a protruding arc at the bottom of the product, which allows it to stably clamp onto the base. Please press the protruding arc firmly and then pull up the main mirror. Does the main mirror of the makeup mirror have a magnifying effect? The main mirror of the makeup mirror has no magnification effect, only the side panel has 2X and 3X magnification, and the package comes with an extra round 10x magnifying mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delighted with this vanity mirror! A perfect Christmas present for teens. The dimmable lighting, mirror, and magnification options are fantastic. I love the flexibility of using batteries or plugging it into an outlet. The compact, foldable design makes it ideal for travel. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a versatile and stylish mirror!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great!
reviews.reviewText: It stands very well, magnifiers are excellent, brightness is excelent and I love the fact that I can use batterys for it because I can just take it to work and use it in the bathroom to do my makeup when I am late, alsoo use it in my car.I think the size is great, its not that big which is great because it fits in my purse but its also not that small because I can get a whole look of my face even with me being so close to it or far either way. Its kind of like an ipad but that opens up obviously but its kind of like that. I love it and it is super in handy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mirror is great!
reviews.reviewText: Love this mirror it changes the makeup game!!! Works really well. Plus, I read a review where someone clipped a book light on for extra light, and I did the same thing. It works out perfectly and is so illuminated. You will not be wasting your money, this is perfect. Just have to keep it clean I got a white one lol. Thanks 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, portable, makeup lamp mirror
reviews.reviewText: This mirror gives side face views. It lights up fairly bright. I love the different magnifications for different applications. The batteries tend to get used up pretty quickly if you go that route. But overall, I like this little mirror with lights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Definite must buy
reviews.reviewText: A definite plus is you can a USB cable or batteries so you will always be able to use the lighting. At that first thought was small, but the size is perfect , and easy to pack for travel and the lighting is bright which really good, you won't get outside in the light and see that make up is too light or dark or uneven. which is a big plus , my regular lightning in my bathroom is to dim. And 10x mirror is also nice to have, if someone can't see without their glasses, you can use it and not need your glasses. So that would be a bonus for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very bright
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is just okay for the price. It isn’t bright enough for makeup application and the little, round magnification mirror is useless. It’s too small and covers the other part of the mirror when you move it. The suction is kind of useless. You end up smudging the mirror when you pry off the the circle mirror. The quality is what I expected for the money. Plastic and somewhat flimsy. It feels like it would break into pieces if I dropped it. I’m sorry I gave my old mirror away. I will use this one until I get my money’s worth out of it. If I had to apply makeup every day with this mirror I would send it back, but it’s not worth packing and returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I loved this mirror as soon as I opened it. Perfect size not too big not too small can travel with it and not take up a lot of room. The light was working on and off. Got ahold of their customer service by email and they sent out a new one immediately, wasn't expecting that!! This one works just as it should and the love how you can adjust the lighting so it's perfect. I normally don't leave reviews but I had to since good customer service is hard to come by these days and the product exceeded my expectations. Will have to see what other things they make, I'll buy from them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this mirror
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this mirror for about a little over a yr or more and I love it so much. I use it everyday to get ready in the morning. The only thing is it sometimes comes off the oval stand that holds it up but it’s meant to come off and on and I am sort of rough with it sometimes. I love all of the different magnifications and I touch button! Very nice. Only thing is that it DRAINS through batteries so quickly but I just plug it up to a portable charger or plug it in the wall and it works awesome.

Aunque resulta funcional, el compartimiento para las pilas está mal ajustado, tus huellas se quedan en la superficie cada vez que lo tocas por el material del que está hecho. No me encantó. Esperaba más la verdad.
Parts missing, returned. Quality of stand not good

It's such a cute mirror to have. I love using it to do my makeup and hair. The magnetized sections are great for when I need close-ups while doing my eyeliner or parting my hair for braids. Haven't used the 10x suction mirror because I don't think I really need it but it's still good to have just in case. The packaging for the mirror is also real cute. Been using this mirror for months and I love it! Definitely worth it!
